column2: an A.M. Eatery////Thursday morning brunch with a friend: arrived 9:15 and the two of us were seated at 9:50. Waiting on noisy Montrose Blvd wasn't fun and it was a bit too noisy inside also for me. We tried Eggs Benedict
column5: and all the food was pretty good. Coffee was free refills. Service was excellent. The atmosphere was lacking a bit though... I like that they hadn't squeezed other tables into the open areas so it felt roomy
column6: but the seating areas were a bit cramped
column7: and there was a lack of character about the place. Overall if you have time to wait in line
column8: definitely put your name on the waiting list and run some errands locally... They'll text you when your table is ready.
